title: Integer literals >= 2^64 cause an ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Compiling the following code causes an ICE.

``` rust
fn main() {
    18446744073709551616; // 2^64
}
```

